author: alpar

comments.content:
Free Font [Znikomit No. 24](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131950/http:/www.typographyserved.com/gallery/Free-Font-Znikomit/3878017) by Grzegorz Luk. Though, your sample seems a little bolder than his original. Perhaps manually stroked, or a new weight of the original?

... and Ryuk got to it before I did. :)
